users.name: Pregnancy Care
users.description: Comprehensive prenatal care, including routine check-ups, ultrasounds, genetic counseling, and childbirth education classes.

users.name: Childbirth
users.description: Vaginal or cesarean delivery services, including labor and delivery, newborn care, and postpartum support.

users.name: Orthopedic Surgery
users.description: Surgical procedures to treat injuries or conditions affecting bones, joints, muscles, and ligaments.

users.name: Cardiac Care
users.description: Diagnosis and treatment of heart conditions, including heart attacks, arrhythmias, and heart failure.

users.name: Neurology
users.description: Diagnosis and treatment of disorders affecting the nervous system, such as stroke, epilepsy, and multiple sclerosis.

users.name: Oncology
users.description: Diagnosis and treatment of cancer, including chemotherapy, radiation therapy, and surgery.

users.name: Emergency Room
users.description: Immediate medical care for urgent and life-threatening conditions...

users.name: Physical Therapy
users.description: Rehabilitation services to help patients regain strength, mobility, and function after injuries or illnesses.

users.name: Mental Health Services
users.description: Therapy and counseling for mental health conditions, including depression, anxiety, and substance abuse.

users.name: Diagnostic Imaging
users.description: X-rays, CT scans, MRI scans, and other imaging tests to diagnose medical conditions.

users.name: Laboratory Services
users.description: Blood tests, urine tests, and other laboratory tests to diagnose and monitor medical conditions.

users.name: Cosmetic Surgery
users.description: Surgical procedures to enhance appearance, such as liposuction, breast augmentation, and rhinoplasty.

users.name: Home Health Care
users.description: Skilled nursing care and therapy services provided in patients' homes.

users.name: Pediatric Care
users.description: Comprehensive healthcare services for infants, children, and adolescents.

users.name: Maternity Care
users.description: Pre- and post-natal care for expectant mothers.
users.duration: Full term pregnancy and post-delivery care
